channel.title: Bootstrapped.fm, episode 67
channel.description:
[**Download episode 67**](http://bootstrapped.fm/bootstrapped-episode-67/)
In this episode, we talk about Mr. Rogers, releasing [How Are Sales Today](http://howaresalestoday.com), writing desktop apps in C++, Parse closing and Uberdeck, Scribbleton, Userscape's new office, Userscape's partner program.
Thanks to Linode for sponsoring! [Sign up today and get $20 off](https://linode.com/bootstrappedfm/?utm_source=bootstrapped&utm_medium=podcast&utm_content=20%20dollar&utm_campaign=bootstrapped2016).
